pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, December 6, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, December 6, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.


12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and members of Cabinet will lay flowers in remembrance of the victims of the École Polytechnique de Montréal massacre.

Centennial Flame
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Special Chiefs Assembly of the Assembly of First Nations.

Hilton Lac-Leamy,
Gatineau, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.


6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Legion of Honour Ceremony for the Right Honourable Brian Mulroney.

Embassy of France
42 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should confirm their attendance with Eric Narvel, 613-408-7097


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
